Description:
Detects the execution of whoami, which is often used by attackers after exploitation / privilege escalation

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Whoami Utility Execution
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where process_path like '%\whoami.exe' and original_file_name = 'whoami.exe'
